title: How to Do Active Meditation

steps.headline: Start to breathe deeply through your nose.
steps.description: Inhale and exhale slowly, filling up your lungs. Get used to this deep breathing style before starting your meditation, as it will be necessary throughout.

steps.headline: Stand up on a comfortable surface.
steps.description: Make sure you have plenty of room to move about chaotically, for at least an hour.

steps.headline: Breathe quickly and very deeply through your nose for 10 minutes.
steps.description:
Focus on exhaling as thoroughly as possible before inhaling. Try to make your breathing get faster and faster, but make sure you always breathe deeply into your lungs. Your goal is to lose track of your body and "become the breathing. text:
Start to breathe deeply through your nose. Inhale and exhale slowly, filling up your lungs. Get used to this deep breathing style before starting your meditation, as it will be necessary throughout. Stand up on a comfortable surface. Make sure you have plenty of room to move about chaotically, for at least an hour. Breathe quickly and very deeply through your nose for 10 minutes. Focus on exhaling as thoroughly as possible before inhaling. Try to make your breathing get faster and faster, but make sure you always breathe deeply into your lungs. Your goal is to lose track of your body and "become the breathing. Stand up on a comfortable surface.
Make sure you have plenty of room to move about chaotically, for at least an hour.
Breathe quickly and very deeply through your nose for 10 minutes.

Your goal is to lose track of your body and "become the breathing.
